div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, May 2, 1911. THE CITY COUNCIL TO OFFER FIVE HUNDRED DOLLARS REWARD FOR THE DISCOVERY OF THE WHEREABOUTS OF ELLA PAROUBEK

body.p: Alderman Anton J. Cermak introduced a resolution at the meeting yesterday of the City Council which provides that the Council authorize the Chief of Police to offer a $500 reward for the finding of Ella Paroubek. The resolution was accepted and turned over to the finance committee.

There is not the least doubt that the committee will take favorable action in the matter, and the reward for the discovery of the missing girl will then amount to $1200. The Bohemian Charitable Association has subscribed $500, the State has subscribed $200, and now the Council has subscribed $500.
